sentences.en: Away into the distance stretched ridge after ridge of snow - clad peaks.
sentences.cn: 冰雪复盖的山峰重重叠叠绵延不断地一直伸向远方.

sentences.en: But little Pearl was not clad in rustic weeds.
sentences.cn: 当然,小珠儿穿的并不是破衣烂衫.

sentences.en: Car wheels don't bite on ice - clad roads.
sentences.cn: 车轮在结冰的路面上容易打滑.

sentences.en: Johnson was clad casually in slacks and a light blue golf shirt.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊身穿休闲宽松的长裤，配以淡蓝色高尔夫衬衫。

sentences.en: Mist was drifting through the pine - clad crags , it would soon be evening.
sentences.cn: 雾在对松山的山峡飘来飘去, 天色眼看黑将下来.

sentences.en: Now appeared Joe Harper, as airily clad and elaborately armed as Tom.
sentences.cn: 这时,乔-哈帕出现了.和汤姆一样,他精心装备,轻装上阵.

sentences.en: Our fur - clad descendents will be crouched over fires.
sentences.cn: 我们的子孙将穿裘裹皮,蜷缩在火堆旁.

sentences.en: She was clad in blue velvet.
sentences.cn: 她身着蓝色的天鹅绒服装。

sentences.en: She went home and returned more suitably clad.
sentences.cn: 她回家了,回来时穿得比较得体了.

sentences.en: The emperor was clad in a rich robe encrusted with jewels.
sentences.cn: 皇帝身穿一件镶满宝石的华贵礼袍.

sentences.en: The mountain was clad in mist.
The old lady was clad in a fur coat.
The walls and floors are clad with ceramic tiles.
sentences.cn: 墙面和地板上都贴着瓷砖。

sentences.en: The woods on the mountain sides were clad in mist.
sentences.cn: 高山坡上的小树林都笼罩在一片薄雾中.

phrases.tran_cn: 复合钢板，船体用复合钢板
覆铜薄层压板；敷铜箔叠层板

trans.tran_cn: 穿衣的，覆盖的，镀过（另一种）金属的，用金属包被的
trans.tran_en: wearing a particular kind of clothing

trans.tran_cn: 穿（衣）( clothe的过去式和过去分词)，在（金属）外面包上另一种金属，（用语言）表达，<文>覆盖
在金属外覆以另一种金属
